weapons.name: Particle Projection Cannon
weapons.description: Shoots a blob of highly charged particles that severely damage matter.

weapons.name: Laser Beam
weapons.description: Shoots photons with enough energy to partially metal steel

weapons.name: Vibroblade
weapons.description: Sword that vibrates at hypersonic speeds and does massive damage but can do damage to wielder

weapons.name: Missles
weapons.description: Unleash a flurry of unguided missles on your foe. Just aim and shoot!

weapons.name: Explosive Spikes
weapons.description: Each explosive spike contains a high telsa electromagnet. Unfortunately the magnet electronics have severely decreased the payload.

weapons.name: Machine Gun
weapons.description: Your basic machine gun. Low damage but can have bursts that deliver extra damage.

modifications.name: Engine Mark-2
modifications.description: State-of-art robot engine increases energy available to all robot systems at the cost of added size and weight.

modifications.name: Fibroblast Armor Plating
modifications.description: An add-on to the standard titanium armor by adding an additional layer of interwoven metal polymer fabric at the cost of added weight.

modifications.name: Energy Shielding
modifications.description: An electro-static energy shield which reduces the velocity of energy and projectile weapons. Drains energy available to the other robot systems.

modifications.name: Carbon-Fiber Frame
modifications.description: Replaces the standard tungsten-carbide robot frame with a lighter Carbon-Fiber frame at the cost durability.

modifications.name: Automated Repair System
modifications.description: Nano-bot automated repair system heals the robot as it battles. Taxing on both the powerplant and CPU.

modifications.name: Nitrobooster
modifications.description: A steady flow Nitrous Oxide into the drivetrain gives unparaelled speed but has been known to cause robots to lose control
